website_summaries.verdict: An all-in-one cleaning solution for all types of common caliber guns.
pros: Comes in a heavy-duty and portable case, and all the proper tools you'll need to clean your guns
The ergonomic case even has extra designated space for your solvent and oil
cons: The case does not include any labeling, which for those new to the sport, can make the task of cleaning more confusing than it needs to be

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This Gun cleaning kit is an excellent bargain. I was in a local gun store and was trying to piece together enough instruments to get all of my guns clean and before you know it I was well over $100 and started looking for multi kits like this one. I quickly decided to order this kit while standing in the store after realizing that this kit offered approx twice the attachments that most of the kits I was looking at while being half the cost. I have cleaned all of my guns with this and am really happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: fatgotti

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need in a cheap well made kit! The cleaning rods are a sturdy heavy brass and the brushes are quality.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Gun Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the cleaning kit. We bought the army green color kit. Brings a lot of pieces for different sizes 🔫 . Our purchase included a separate little baggie with the cotton swabs and other items, but my hubby managed to fit it all in the case. It did include two empty bottles for lubricants/oil (which we purchased separately). I like this case because it is not bulky or heavy which makes it easy to carry and easy to store away. My husband likes it.
customer_reviews.author: ☆Michelle☆

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the money. It comes with everything you will need and even some extras on the side, just need to purchase bore cleaner/oil separately.
customer_reviews.author: Cody High

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need to clean and maintain all of my inventory is all contained in one easy to use, well laid out, and convenient place. None of the tools feel flimsy. The container is sturdy, and there are more than enough parts and pieces to ensure no part of your piece gets left out.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a new cleaning kit because I was missing ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new cleaning kit because I was missing pieces to my old kit. The kit arrived on time and I was able to get started cleaning my guns that night, in preparation for the upcoming hunting season. I then sighted several rifles and pistols in this weekend and then recleaned my guns. This is cleaning kit had everything I needed except solvent and oil, which I already had in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: 159 Piece Gun Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: Comprehensive tools and equipment to clean probably every modern firearm known to man. High quality and inclusive of everything except lubrication oil.but not a deal breaker...Nicely laid out and arranged. Easy to keep organized. Good value at a fair price. Used it yesterday morning and was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning set... just one problem.
customer_reviews.text: all of the cleaning tools one would need to clean a pistol or rifle. I just wish they used a heavier plastic for the case: the plastic feels very cheap, kinda like cheap packaging you get around something you buy at the store, i think that one day the case will dent from moving it around. if it was not for that, i would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Pro-FoodChoice

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Yea you want the brushes to be tight. Not so tight that they don’t fit without a lot of force. Rod broke on first use. Metal clip that holds the T-handle on the other rod fell off while I was using it and landed in the grass never to be seen again. A lot of parts don’t fit each other. Seems like a very cheap kit overall. They sell less expensive and higher quality kits at Walmart. I’m going to throw this in the trash and just accept the loss and buy some bore snakes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hester

customer_reviews.title: I’ve read from multiple firearm sources reading ofwhat is a good quality and reasonably priced universal gun cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Everything advertised is here. I’ve read from multiple firearm sources of what is a good quality and reasonably priced universal gun cleaning kit ,and this is one of them. I cleaned my 9mm with it and I was pleased . Every tool is labeled for the proper caliber. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITH .22 OR LOWER
customer_reviews.text: None of the .22 .17 cleaning attachments fit on the .22 cleaning rod. Purchased to use on my .223 rifle and all the cleaning attachments are completely useless because they only fit the .30 rod that doesn't fit in my barrel. Great kit if you have a .30 bore or greater though.
customer_reviews.author: eric uginchus

customer_reviews.title: Only cleaning kit you need
customer_reviews.text: O my gun cleaning kit you need. Has everything, multiple cal cleaners, and many types of cleaning equipment. I'm very meticulous with my guns, they get very dirty as you know after shooting them at the range, and with this kit I get them looking like they never been fired.
customer_reviews.author: christopher sypniewski

customer_reviews.title: Very complete gun-cleaning kit, covering all bases
customer_reviews.text: This gun-cleaning kit is very ample in its offerings. As stated, pretty much any firearm can be cleaned with the elements included in this kit. It's also lightweight, so it can be packed and taken to the range (or wherever), without adding much weight to the load-out. I particularly liked that it came with two long-nosed bottles, which can serve to dispense the bore cleaning solution and lubricant oil in a very economical, focused way. My only issue with this gun-cleaning kit, and the reason I didn't give it 5 stars, is that the handles on the ends of the cleaning rods don't detach; I would prefer that they did.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: The rods seem very cheap and if they encounter any resistance, they appear to break easily. The .22 wire brush was apparently a bit large and created some resistance and caused the rod to break without even much force applied.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Dauksas

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the best cleaning kit out there, but has everything that you would need to clean almost any rifle, handgun, or shotgun. My only problem is that the slotted patch loops are plastic and don’t thread into the cleaning rod well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wharton

customer_reviews.title: Rods Broke -- But they Fixed
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this at all. The kit comes with two push rods. The handle of the larger one literally came apart while I was working on my second gun. I tried to finish with the smaller one and the screw attachment inside the rod detached from its metal casing. Most of the stuff in the kit is fine, but the rods stink. Also this seems to be one of those weird Amazon-only companies with no website of its own. UPDATE: I emailed the seller and they are replacing the rods! So I have changed my review from 1-star to 4-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bozeman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great quantity
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product. 2 different size cleaning rods for different firearms. Extra pieces to ensure you can maintain a clean piece even if one goes missing. Great selection of tools to use and definitely cant miss or not be able to reach a spot. I highly recommend this product. Its affordable and great quality. Keep up the good work Gloryfire. Will definitely continue to use your products.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Woods

customer_reviews.title: No 5.56/223
customer_reviews.text: Said there are pieces for 5.56 and there are none to be found returning and buying a 5.56 kit
customer_reviews.author: Caitlynn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great value and works well
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product 5 stars if there had been etched descriptions of what caliber the brush or swab was in the plastic case. I had to take a look at some of the closer calibers. Otherwise great value and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It has everything I need to clean all my pistols, rifles, shotguns, and more. It replaced my three cleaning kits and has more flexibility and cleaning items than the other three together. It even has brushes and swabs for .17 caliber. I recommend this kit for anyone wanting to keep their firearms clean and lubricated. The seller was shipped fast and the kit was well packed. Buy with confidence. You won't find a better product or a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Callen Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: As described but kinda flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The kit is as described. I tried it because it was relatively inexpensive. A thin, plastic case that feels kinda flimsy. It does help hold things in their place though, I’ll give them that. The plastic tips and jags are like the plastic parts I used to get on toy model kits as a kid. They are very cheap and will wear out quickly with the normal use for me. Lots of brushes in sizes I’ll never need but hey, maybe you have a gun of every caliber! Same with the bore swabs.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T

customer_reviews.title: My Guns Are Happy
customer_reviews.text: All the tools I need at the moment, to clean a wide variety of guns that I own. The interior of the case is very well laid out, and the quality of the cleaning rod appear to be okay, for normal use. The shipment and arrival was quick, and there was no damage to any of the cleaning tools.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: No Bang mostly Bust!
customer_reviews.text: Missing patches. Contacted service team as directed for contents issues. No response. Not a fan of plastic jags. Already broke on basic pistol cleaning. Brass wire brushes appear missing bristles before use...never saw brushes with receding hairline before any use. Seemed like good price based upon contents. Don’t recommend as contents quite marginal and there is not good function or value here.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cleanliness is next to gunliness
customer_reviews.text: I carry this in my field bag and have used it twice since. Being pretty new to the weapons game, it was a little difficult figuring out what and how to use exactly, but you'll figure it out. I expected the bottles to possibly leak but they haven't. I would definitely consider this a must to have in your arsenal, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: MiCoats

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this 5 stars because of the price and instruction booklet of some sort even an online version would be great to have to know how to use this especially for a novice done user. Be informed there is no cleaning tools in this kit for a 9 mm projectile which is what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Quintero Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, with very reasonable price. Highly recommended by my friends who plays guns for ages... I also would recommend it to others if you are looking for a nice cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.author: Demi Liu

customer_reviews.title: Well made kit
customer_reviews.text: I received the kit from Amazon and used it the next day, It performed as expected and worked really well. It is a true all around kit for most any caliber and the parts are well made. The only improvement that I would like to see is a little larger kit and it would also contain gun lube and bore solvent. I realize that this would add to the cost but it would be nice to have those items in the kit also.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I need
customer_reviews.text: This gun cleaning kit comes with absolutely everything, cleaning cloths, rods, cotton tips and different caliber cleaning ends. It also comes with two squeeze bottles to put your cleaning solution and oil in. After receiving this I spent the next 3 hours cleaning every weapon I had because I had all the bits and pieces to get them done. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: e-dude

customer_reviews.title: This kit cleans all the different guns that I own.
customer_reviews.text: So I spend wanted a single cleaning kit that would clean all the different guns that I shoot. I can across this one and bought it. I’m certainly glad that I bought it. It keeps everything organized and is clearly labeled what goes to what chamber size so I don’t mess my guns up. The storage case makes it easy to keep everything together and protects it nicely.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Half the kit was missing.
customer_reviews.text: Half the kit was missing. Very disappointed as I was counting on most of the parts that were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Recinos

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best bang for your buck. There's alot of super expensive sets out there and then there is this one. Not so expensive but has everything you need. Except gun oil of course but I bought a bottle of Hoppe's oil, only the best. The kit does come with an empty bottle to put your oil in. I carry a compact ruger .380 and Taurus tactical .45 and this kit has everything i need to clean and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Gun Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit, it really includes everything. The only knock is the teeny tiny bottles they give you to fill with gun cleaner and oil. They are so small as to be basically un-usable in that you can't fill them up without spilling half of your expensive stuff. Small complaint I know. Other that that I really like it, you get all the basics, everything needed to clean almost any weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Car guy

customer_reviews.title: Super-fast shipping and a Super Comprehensive Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome kit in the sense that you can buy everything all at once. It is a universal kit that has a bit of everything (and plenty of it!) and seems to be perfect. The shipping was extremely fast and the seller has been extremely helpful with any questions that I have had. Once I clean my guns up, I plan on going shooting for a weekend. Thank you, to the folks at Gloryfire. I would buy from them again as this seems to be a great product from a great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Silly Donkey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for most applications
customer_reviews.text: I have thoroughly loved this if you have a lot of guns and need variety. The only downside is if you only have say 5 guns, then you probably only use half the kit. So take that into consideration when you buy. It may be cheaper to just buy individual kits for your guns if you only have a few.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C

customer_reviews.title: Can clean ALL types of guns!
customer_reviews.text: Between the rods and attachments you can clean anything from a 22 pistol to a 12 gauge shotgun (plus other types I can't even recall). This set also includes materials if you clean black powder guns/rifles. Cleaning patches and polishing cloths are included to really complete any type of cleaning needed. An easy to use thorough kit at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: I have several pistols and rifles and this case presents me with "one stop cleaning", it has every caliber that I need and some that I'll soon need. The case is laid out fairly well and is sturdy. For the money, it's really a very good deal and nice kit.
customer_reviews.author: Hedlite

customer_reviews.title: I highly recomend
customer_reviews.text: I have used several gun cleaners and have lost or broken the parts to all of them over the years. This keeps everything organized and clean so I no longer am losing components. They are also of very high quality where the patch loops are not breaking off . IF you are looking for an all-in-one gun cleaning kit, this is the one
customer_reviews.author: D. Justin

customer_reviews.title: IF they marked the box with caliber markings on to ...
customer_reviews.text: IF they marked the box with caliber markings on to make it easier to find the right brush.... i would had give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Bent tip
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product about a month or 2 ago. Went to clean my fathers .22 and realized that one of the attachment ends were bent at the very top. The band was where the attachments screw in so I was unable to clean his forearm properly
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Diverse gift
customer_reviews.text: Great kit - gifted it to my husband for Christmas. He said he liked the variety of sizes of jags and mops for cleaning different barrels. He also liked that the oil bottles were refillable so he can just fill them up and keep them with the kit. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mommy of 5

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit, poor rod quality
customer_reviews.text: Most of the kit works well. There are some things in it that I don’t need, and other things that I added to it (a metal scraper, long Q tips, a CAT tool, and bore snakes). My only complain is that the smaller rod broke after about 5 uses. Part of the extension is stuck inside the rod connected to the handle. I can make do for now, but I’d recommend buying a sturdier rod.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, but could be better if they included ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, but could be better if they included a bore snake and had caliper sizes engraved in the case for attachments. I don't like having to guess which one will fit. But overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great value cleaning kit for all your firearms
customer_reviews.text: Great kit and great value. I'll be using this over the weekend to fully clean up my AR after a few range outings. At this point it's definitely a highly recommended product and I'll post any updates if they're needed should any revision be needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Packaging stinks
customer_reviews.text: Seems like everything was of good quality. Not sure if I would buy again though. Opened the box and nothing in the kit was where it was suppose to be. Everything fell out and nothing quite fit right in the slots. I suspect I will have the same issue every time I open it. I still don’t know if I have everything in the right spot. I emailed the company and haven’t heard back from them
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Cozad

customer_reviews.title: Compact & versatile
customer_reviews.text: Cool little kit. Very lightweight. I'll probably have it be the base of my gun bag, as it is a good base shape being thin and flat. It comes with A LOT of different calibers, sizes and applications. Pretty happy with it for the price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jimhova

customer_reviews.title: GREAT KIT!
customer_reviews.text: This kit contains every thing you would need to possibly clean a gun. The parts are well made and strong. It comes with plenty of metal brushes. All in all I don't think you could buy a better kit all the parts come in the case where everything has a place, very neat and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: I read reviews where people say the bore cleaning brush breaks too easily, I put a ton of pressure on mine ...
customer_reviews.text: The kit has everything that you need. They sent a few free extra such as the cotton swabs and plastic picks which made it very convenient. The kit is everything that you need. I read reviews where people say the bore cleaning brush breaks too easily, I put a ton of pressure on mine and nothing broke.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great all around Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need. I took everything out and put it in a fishing tackle box and it works great. The only thing I would add is a .556 caliber specialty cleaner. Came exactly as expected. Good Product Overall.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what I expected. Not the highest quality but not terrible either. The case is cheap so it does not hold all the tools properly in their inserts which isn't good. I will probably replace this with another higher quality brand in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.NoBS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like it and use it for my Sig P238 and Glock
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Rich

customer_reviews.title: One kit to reign them all
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need. The bonus gift was nice too. The only thing negative I can say, I can say about pretty much ANY gun cleaning kit it the rods get wobbly when assembled together.
customer_reviews.author: SDCharger123

customer_reviews.title: Value pack
customer_reviews.text: Have all i need! Bought this for my friend as a gift. He really like the value of the pack and i enlighen his day! Go with him to shoot a couple of times and really want to give him a gift. This is a good surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Has what you need
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything that you could ask for in a cleaning kit except for lubricant/cleaner. Everything was included and functions properly but the rods are NOT very sturdy. If you apply too much pressure on them they feel as though they may snap like twigs. Of course, at this price and considering all that is included, this is a great kit nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wide variety of items
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money but have no use for a steel wire utility brush for gun cleaning. Replace that with another nylon brush and it would a 5 star, but thats just my opinion. The brush works great for auto parts cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY F. MORRIS

customer_reviews.title: Well made kit
customer_reviews.text: The kit is very well made and priced great. It possesses everything your average cleaning kit does for a much better price. I was especially surprised with durability of the brushes and brass rods. This is a great product for for price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: Solid kit. Comparable with anything else on the market. I’m happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott In Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We had a different cleaning kit for what seemed like every gun we owned, so I bought this for our household in hopes that I could consolidate some of our clutter. This is perfect! It had everything we needed for all our guns in one sturdy and organized kit. It was super user friendly, and all the parts we have used so far seem like really good quality for the price. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 80 lb pitbull to help with off leash training. It was incredibly easy to setup and begin using the day we got it! The product works exactly as described. Many levels of strength on each setting. Collar is adjustable to fit any size dog. Carrying case is perfect for keeping all the pieces together when its not being used. Would highly recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans any gun and is well organized
customer_reviews.text: This kit is AMAZING. It has everything I needed to clean my 2 9mm pistols and my Mossberg 500 12 gauge. Everything worked well and was really durable. After a heavy shooting day at the range I was able to clean everything really well with everything I needed in this kit. The case keeps everything in neat order and marked for easy findings. I definitely recommend this for anyone wanting a nice, versatile cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.author: James Cox

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. Covers all calibers.
customer_reviews.text: Covers all calibers and has everything you need excapt for the solvent and lubricant. Jags are plastic but do the job. Not the highest quality and you could pay more but why for things that are going to need replacing after good use anyway. Nice refillable dropper bottles included as well.
customer_reviews.author: SYOTW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit for several guns and it works great! Came with several items to accommodate all my guns. Cleaning oil not included, so make sure you purchase that if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Slacker

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options - None work
customer_reviews.text: After looking at the pics I thought this would be the one to get -- it was flimsy and broke right out of the box. I've never had a fun cleaning rod break -- junk.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning bore thread snapped off the first time I tried to use it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Very good gun cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning skit is the most complete kit I have ever seen. Only one improvement I would strongly suggest would be to replace the plastic patch carriers and jags with brass. Such and improvement would earn a five star review. The preceding is the justification for the four star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: He loved the different sizes of brushes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband as a Christmas Gift. He was excited when he opened it. He loved the different sizes of brushes. He made a remark that the rods were good and sturdy unlike his old ones. We would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Good for the average gun owner
customer_reviews.text: This is a good kit. I don't know how it compares to others but seems to have a lot of attachments and allowed me to clean my shot gun, pistol and rifle so I am happy with it. The box is nice to keep it organized.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Complete set
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need to clean a .22 to a .50 cal muzzelloader. Carrying case is a great organizer. I like how the case is plastic instead of wood like many others.
customer_reviews.author: cory wilner

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit.
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a single cleaning kit tha would accomodate all my guns. This definitely gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: David Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Gloryfire=greatness
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit for almost any caliber. I used a slightly to big soft end piece and my rod snapped. Well I contacted customer support amd they were true to their word and more. They provided me not just the replacement rod but a whole new set of rods. Very rare to find customer service like this.
customer_reviews.author: Pickleing

customer_reviews.title: great basic gun cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: also comes with pics and swabs not in the photo. handy kit to carry to the range or lease. lots of jags and brushes. nicer than the kit I bought at basspro for was less money.
customer_reviews.author: Ed L.

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: came quickley with what I needed to clean my guns properly while I was on vacation
customer_reviews.author: pa user

customer_reviews.title: Very universal
customer_reviews.text: Just started getting into cleaning my own firearms. This was perfect cleaning all types of firearms from my krag to my savage axis.
customer_reviews.author: dennis vigil

customer_reviews.title: Every gun owner
customer_reviews.text: Got this to suprise my husband and he loves it. This is something every gun owner should have. Love the storage box too, keeps everything neat and tidy. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas & Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Not that bad of a set. I picked it up just to have a travel set for the range and it definitely serves its purpose. You can tell that some of the items are on the cheaper side due to quality but for the money and all the items you get its still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Z

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of gear to add to the collection. All the pieces fit together and I have been using it for all my pistols. Only thing I have issues with is there needs to be 3 cleaning rod sections plus a T handle for most rifles. I do have issues cleaning the barrel with only two cleaning rod extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hoped it would be better.
customer_reviews.text: Bore sizes are larger than described. Cheap parts break easily. Do not recomend.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Well stocked cleaning kit!
customer_reviews.text: Well rounded cleaning kit with almost any tool you'd need to keep your firearms in good shape. I go through cleaning supplies pretty fast, and look at most of the items in this kits as disposable. Well eventually they're disposable.
customer_reviews.author: NavyP220

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift for my husband and he loved it. He said it came with everything he ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband and he loved it. He said it came with everything he needed except for the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you will need
customer_reviews.text: Some of the smaller pieces fall out and rattle around inside the case. I wish they would fit better and stay in place. This kit has everything for every caliber.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Mann

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased it the description & picture said that it came with 10 N95 masks. When I received the package it did NOT come with the masks nor was I notified during or before shipping that I would not receive the masks as showed. The kit is decent but FALSE ADVERTISE. Would like my $ back.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product.It has more cleaning options than my last kit and now I 'm able to clean my handgun,rifle and shotgun all with this one kit. It cleans very well without harming or scratching the gun and it is perfect cleaning kit. It has a wide variety of brushes and I'd definitely recommend this.Will be buying from GLORYFIRE again!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Chen

customer_reviews.title: Just About Everything
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of kit to have, I bought my first rifle (old and used .22 bolt action) and this has everything needed to clean and maintain it- minus solvent, lube, and tools to fully dismantle your firearm, of course. Should be enough for most people/ rifles as the kit has a lot of pieces specific for various calibers.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Wooks  good and has quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and the hard wear is great. The bottles for the cleaner and oil ARE empty. This not a bad thing just an FYI. I also recommend to YouTube the dissemble and cleaning videos of your fire arm.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Pappalardo

customer_reviews.title: Universal Gun Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: The gun cleaning kit is a Christmas present for my son. I am happy with the quality of the kit. It was delivered on time and the packaging was kept everything from being damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Healy

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. All the cleaning items are in an orderly fashion and easy to identify. No need to hunt around for correct size brushes, cleaning rods or jags; they are all together in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fellows

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality .
customer_reviews.text: All the things I want are included in this box. I have a design that I like very much. The inside of the box is marked with BRUSHES, JAGS and MOPS. When I use it, I will put it back. And which brush to use to clean which caliber gun can be clearly known. Very good design, very suitable for newcomers like me.
customer_reviews.author: jim chen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice for all guns
customer_reviews.text: This kit contained everything you would need for any gun. It even has the caliber of the gun each tool cleans labeled. Very good quality kit. It was so nice we even ordered one for another family member
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of gun cleaning tools
customer_reviews.text: I like the case design where everything is stored efficiently and you can see everything easily. I use these tools often and it makes gun cleaning and maintenance easier.
customer_reviews.author: Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, convenient size.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a great universal cleaning this is the product or you. It came with everything I needed and I love the durable carrying case, it's a pretty convenient size and fits into my range bag just fine. Shipping was prompt and arrived with no issues. If you're not a fan of multi-piece cleaning rods you can supplement this kit with a single piece rod, but I've had no issues with the multi-piece ones myself. Overall I highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This has it all. Specially if you have different calibers. Would be better if everything was labeled in the case but other than that, it is perfect. It has strong rods that don't bend easily like Hope's cleaning kit
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for a clean firearm!
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need to clean whatever gun you have. Solid quality and you get more than what you pay for. Super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: apkesler

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value and kit. We are pleased with the kit as it’s convenient case makes everything readily available
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Poor product. Only came with three of the brass connectors. Box is flimsy. Products inside bounce around and when you open they aren’t in their spots anymore. Not happy about the missing pieces. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Fields

customer_reviews.title: Very good kit
customer_reviews.text: I shoot many different disciplines and this kit works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s intended to do great
customer_reviews.text: Not all items fit in case where they are supposed to go. Works perfect for cleaning and lubricating only issue is with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Stan K.

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made products
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped to purchase and all in one cleaning kit but wanted something that was built to last. It stated on amazon that this particular item was a best seller but I immediately notice how cheap the content of this kit was. I cant imagine this set lasting more than a couple cleanings. I'm willing to pay for quality . Unfortunately this kit wasn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Makes adjustments much easier. You can see exactly where you hit the target at distance. Won’t be going back to another target.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed for cleaning a variety of guns, and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: kelly pletcher

customer_reviews.title: a excellent firearms cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Glorfied universal Rifle cleaning kit in a beautiful green box with everything you need for your guns a excellent buy on Amazon. Com
customer_reviews.author: R.West

customer_reviews.title: Good for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Brushes are a little bit soft, so don't expect to use this on a firearm that wasn't taken care of and get it clean. All in all it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Don Pittman

product_meta.title: GLORYFIRE Universal Gun Cleaning Kit Hunting Rifle Handgun Shot Gun Cleaning Kit for All Guns with Case Travel Size Portable Metal Brushes
feature_bullets: All-in-one: Universal cleaning accessory kit for used for all types of shotguns, rifles and pistol cleaning. All you need to clean common caliber guns in a compact case. Our case is designed to keep the pieces in their place, we also included 2 spaces to put you cleaning oil and solvent.

No Cheap Plastic: All our slotted tips and cleaning jags are made of high quality nylon plastic. Sets from other brands use cheap plastic tips that can easily break after two uses. With this set you will not experience the frustration of having a broken jag/tip inside your gun barrel.
Helpful & Portable: Keep your guns performing at their best by utilizing this cleaning/maintenance kit. Everything is kept neat and organized in the lightweight durable plastic carrying case.

Package:3 solid brass rods for 17-270 caliber rifles; 3 solid brass rods for 30 caliber rifles, pistols, shotguns and muzzleloaders; In addition the Universal Gun Cleaning Kit also has 14 brushes; 9 mops; 12 spear-pointed jags; 1 black powder jag; 4 slotted patch loops; 3 utility brushes; 3 muzzle guards; 3 accessory adapters; 50 3×3" cleaning patches and 4 polishing clothes.
Some of the accessories are consumable, so we prepare multiple accessories in our California warehouse. If you have any problems while using, please contact us, we'll be glad to help you.
